title: T206 Set Break Buy, Sell, Trade (Entire set broken up 1 by 1 in thread)
author: Sean1125

posts.post_title: T206 Set Break Buy, Sell, Trade (Entire set broken up 1 by 1 in thread)
posts.post_content: At this point in time I am going to respond to all current PM's and emails, but I am pulling the set off the table. I've spent the last two hours and sent out over 120 scans and prices without a single purchase. I will repost when I am more organized with pricing and scans.

PM sent


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk

Sean,

Do you have scans/pictures of the cards somewhere, or do we message you if we are interested in seeing scans of certain cards?

Thanks

[quote name="jasonc" post=1829782]Sean,

Do you have scans/pictures of the cards somewhere, or do we message you if we are interested in seeing scans of certain cards?

Thanks[/QUOTE]

Jason,

Message interest list (line by line is easiest) ----> Prices ----> Photos.

Regards,

Sean
